translations: n．缩减，削减：减少、限制或缩短某事物的行动或过程。
· The government announced curtailments in public spending.
政府宣布削减公共支出。

sentences.sentence: I am also proud that we will realize the project without any curtailments or compromises within the given budget.
sentences.translation: 我还感到自豪，我们将实现没有任何不得不削减或在给定的预算妥协的项目。
